name: Boxitaire
description:
This is a puzzle game that involves rotating and placing shapes on to the grid, creating boxes, and then smashing them for points. All the while, you are trying to stop the conveyor belt from getting full and ending your game.

I have recently introduced a Leaderboard.

Press ‘f’ to swap between full screen and windows mode .

I have already released the game on the Google Play Store and the AppStore, but I realised that it also plays well on the PC.

It would be great if you could give this game a try and let me know what you think. Also let me know if there are any improvements that I could make.
